New Records: Fazalhaq Farooqi's maiden five-wicket haul in international cricket
Key Match Events: Fazalhaq Farooqi's ferocious pace in the first over sealed Ronak Patel and Roger Mukasa's trip back to the pavilion on two consecutive deliveries
Mujeeb Ur Rahman joined the action in the next over and deceived Simon Ssesazi with a googly
Naveen-ul-Haq scalped two in the fifth over to reduce Uganda to 18/5
Fazalhaq Farooqi struck was on a hat-trick for the second time after picking up two consecutive wickets
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan openers Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran took off in no time, taking advantage of decent batting conditions
Uganda gave away easy runs as the team failed in the fielding from early on
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan players celebrated as Uganda's captain Brian Masaba walked off dismissed during the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran's fierce opening partnership propelled Afghanistan to 183/5 against Uganda
Gurbaz scored the highest with 76 off 45 while opener Zadran smashed 70 runs in 46 balls powering Afghanistan to a fighting total
Afghanistan recorded the second-highest opening stand in the men's T20 World Cup
